tool_description: Verifies compatibility between multiple selected appliances, checking for conflicts in dimensions, utilities, operations, and integration features.

smart_home_integration.description: Whether smart home integration is desired

error_messages: Appliance conflict detected: Specified appliances have dimensional or utility conflicts
Integration mismatch: Smart home protocols are incompatible between appliances
Operational interference: Some appliances may interfere with each other's operation
Model not found: One or more appliance models not in compatibility database
usage: Input your selected appliances to check for any compatibility issues and get recommendations for optimal integration.
